turns.content: write me a "roses are red..." poem about how much i like my data science team

Roses are red, violets are blue,
My data science team, I adore you!
With models and code, you work with such ease,
Bringing insights and clarity, you aim to please.

Your skills and expertise are truly divine,
Always solving problems with mathematical rhyme.
From data wrangling to machine learning,
Your brilliance and teamwork are always so reassuring.

So here's to my team, with gratitude and glee,
For all the insights you've helped me to see.
Your passion and dedication make me beam,
My data science team, you're truly a dream!
Use less extreme language such as "like" instead of "love"

Roses are red, violets are blue,
I really like my data science crew.
Their skills and knowledge leave me impressed,
Their teamwork and insights, I find the best.

With modeling and analysis, they work with such care,
Making sense of data, they're always aware.
Their expertise and dedication make me feel so great,
My data science team, I appreciate.

So here's to my team, with gratitude and cheer,
For all the insights that they bring year after year.
Their passion and hard work make my day,
My data science team, you're the best in every way!
My team works with data from water sensors and flood risk maps. Can you include this in the poem?

Roses are red, violets are blue,
I truly admire my data science crew.
They work with water sensors and flood risk maps,
Analyzing the data with their technical claps.

From river levels to rainfall and more,
They analyze it all to give us a score.
Their work keeps us informed, day and night,
My data science team always shines so bright.

Their insights help us prepare and take action,
To mitigate the risks of water's reaction.
Their work is so crucial, and we owe them a lot,
My data science team, you're simply top-notch.

So here's to my team, with gratitude and pride,
For all the knowledge and insights they provide.
Their passion and expertise are simply the key,
My data science team, you're simply the best to me!
